keyPolicies.policyDescription: Elaine will work to: scrap the unfair Council Tax, introduce a Land Value Tax, provide healthier school meals, rid our streets of litter and dog-fouling, support local shops and town centres, improve public transport, and extend free personal care for the elderly.
She will work to increase the number of affordable homes, provide better support for young mothers, oppose tuition fees and graduate endowment, and support apprenticeships and training.
Elaine Morrison pledges to protect public services, fight against climate change, campaign for investment in renewable energy, and protect our green spaces.

issues.education: Elaine will oppose tuition fees and graduate endowment.
issues.environment: She pledges to protect our green spaces, fight against climate change, and campaign for investment in renewable energy.
issues.socialWelfare: Elaine will introduce a Land Value Tax, provide healthier school meals, rid our streets of litter and dog-fouling, support local shops and town centres, improve public transport, and extend free personal care for the elderly.

housing.content: Elaine will work to increase the number of affordable homes.
